title: Lunar Cult Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to prevent a player from visiting their first target tonight.
- Use 2 bees to suspend all abilities used on a player tonight and choose a number 1-3. Abilities suspended this way will resolve after that many nights. You learn all abilities suspended this way.
- Use 3 bees to permanently remove a player from the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
- On Full Moon nights, you learn your targets' roles.
- On Blood Moon nights, you may use one ability without paying its bee cost.
